# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by many of our customers. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $140. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, so don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
